data.name: Archibase
description: Designed, proposed, and implemented new features for existing web applications
Implemented feature requests into actual code
Maintained web crawlers following website updates
Performed code reviews and tests for pull requests
examples: Created Vue frontend and Ruby backends for search autocompletion
Refactored static search page to single page application
Implemented free text search that matched to existing database tags
Deployed AWS Lambda instances to backup company data

data.name: Latona Inc.
description: Maintenance and development internal company infrastructure
Containerization and deployment of machine learning models
Creating proposals for clients seeking technical consultations
examples: Creation of new company tool for attendance management in Django
Prototyping of edge device frontends in React
Maintenance of Ansible scripts for nvidia Jetson edge devices
Deployment of machine learning models with Docker and Kubernetes onto nvidia Jetson devices.
